title: Toyota "make things better" face...
content:
If anybody can ID the following face, (sample below) it’d be massively appreciated... If it’s proprietary, a close match or reasonably similar suggestion would be great too!

Thanks!

-J

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132947im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/i_pricing_main_e_6602.gif)

 [‹ JB Hi-Fi Logo (Australian/NZ Electronics store chain)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132947/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43219 "Go to previous forum topic") [Renfrew: Is there a more legitimate version ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132947/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43265 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lumpycustard

comments.content: I guess its a custom face for Toyota.
I’m pretty sure I’ve seen this one with that special y just recently.

[edit: Okay, rendered obsolete by Angel’s unbeatable wisdom – I should have trusted Jan ;-)]

Some alternatives:  
 [Vista Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132947/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/vista-sans/), [Klavika](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132947/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/klavika/), [PTL Notes](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132947/http:/www.primetype.com/faces_info.php?fid=19) …  
If you like the ‘some-serif i’, check out the typefaces by [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132947/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Erik%252BSpiekermann), like [Officina](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132947/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_officina_sans/), [Info](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132947/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_info_text_ot/) or [Unit](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132947/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_unit_1_pro/).  
F
Fantastic. Thanks a lot for the prompt responses... The alternatives are great too. Much appreciated everyone!
